DOC.brief_summary: Observational registry to assess the longer-term risk of serious infections and malignancies reported with TNFα-blocker therapy, as well as the longer-term risk of cardiovascular and thromboembolic events in adult Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA) patients treated with Cimzia® as compared to non-biologic DMARD-treated controls.
DOC.brief_title: National Data Bank for Rheumatic Disease Registry Study of Safety in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Treated With Cimzia® or Disease-modifying Antirheumatic Drugs (DMARDs)
DOC.criteria: RA and started treatment with certolizumab pegol (Cimzia®; CZP) or nonbiologic DMARD within the last 6 months
